{{cpp/title|setbase}}
{{cpp/io/manip/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=iomanip|
/*unspecified*/ setbase( int base );
}}

Sets the numeric base of the stream. When used in an expression {{c|out &lt;&lt; setbase(base)}} or {{c|in &gt;&gt; setbase(base)}}, changes the {{tt|basefield}} flag of the stream {{c|out}} or {{c|in}}, depending on the value of {{c|base}}: 

* the value {{c|16}} sets {{tt|basefield}} to {{lc|std::ios_base::hex}}.
* the value {{c|8}} sets {{lc|std::ios_base::oct}}.
* the value {{c|10}} sets {{lc|std::ios_base::dec}}.

Values of {{c|base}} other than 8, 10, or 16 reset {{tt|basefield}} to zero, which corresponds to decimal output and prefix-dependent input.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|base|new value for basefield}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{cpp/io/manip/iomanip return value|setbase}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iomanip&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;sstream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Parsing string \"10 0x10 010\"\n";
    
    int n1, n2, n3;
    std::istringstream s("10 0x10 010");
    
    s &gt;&gt; std::setbase(16) &gt;&gt; n1 &gt;&gt; n2 &gt;&gt; n3;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "hexadecimal parse: " &lt;&lt; n1 &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; n2 &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; n3 &lt;&lt; '\n';
    
    s.clear();
    s.seekg(0);
    
    s &gt;&gt; std::setbase(0) &gt;&gt; n1 &gt;&gt; n2 &gt;&gt; n3;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "prefix-dependent parse: " &lt;&lt; n1 &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; n2 &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; n3 &lt;&lt; '\n';
    
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "hex output: " &lt;&lt; std::setbase(16)
              &lt;&lt; std::showbase &lt;&lt; n1 &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; n2 &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; n3 &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
Parsing string "10 0x10 010"
hexadecimal parse: 16 16 16
prefix-dependent parse: 10 16 8
hex output: 0xa 0x10 0x8
}}
